identity.name: Luxe Looks
identity.description: A 1920s Parisian jewelry boutique reimagined for the digital age. Opulent, precise, and airy.
key_principles: Light Art Deco: Ivory backgrounds, not black.
Geometric Precision: Stepped corners, L-brackets, double-line borders.
Editorial Typography: Big serif headings, clean geometric body.
Asymmetry: Broken grids to avoid 'template' feel.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Marcellus&family=Josefin+Sans:wght@300;400;500;600&display=swap');

layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid with Art Deco Asymmetry. Use 'col-span-12 md:col-span-8' vs 'col-span-4' splits.

Button.style: uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold border border-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 rounded-none px-8 py-3

Card.style: bg-[#FBF7F0] border border-[#D4AF37]/20 p-8 rounded-none relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-[#D4AF37] transition-colors duration-500

Input.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-[#D4AF37]/30 focus:border-[#D4AF37] rounded-none px-0 py-4 text-lg focus:ring-0 placeholder:text-[#5B5B5B]/50 font-serif

admin_panel_guidelines.layout: Sidebar navigation with Midnight Blue (#1E3D59) background and Gold (#D4AF37) active states.
admin_panel_guidelines.dashboard: Cards must not use shadows. Use 1px borders. High density grids.
admin_panel_guidelines.tables: Use 'Marcellus' for headers. Striped rows with #F2EBDD/20.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE tailwind.config.js with the colors defined above immediately.
3. OVERRIDE shadcn/ui components: Remove all 'rounded-md' classes. This is an Art Deco brand, squares are king.
4. IMPLEMENT the 'L-bracket' decorative element on product cards using pseudo-elements (::before/::after).
5. ENSURE the Admin Panel shares the same 'font-family' and 'border-color' system as the storefront, but can be denser.
6. USE 'framer-motion' for all page transitions. No jump cuts.
7. DO NOT use black backgrounds. Use #F7F3EA (Ivory Mist).
8. CREATE a 'Glass' effect using backdrop-blur-md + bg-[#F7F3EA]/80 for sticky headers.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
